org.usfirst.frc.team3926.robot

Class OI

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.usfirst.frc.team3926.robot.OI

  • public class OI
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the glue that binds the controls on the physical operator interface to the commands and command groups that allow control of the robot. TODO make it easier to switch what joystick something is on TODO Add auxiliary driver stick TODO add SmartDashboard joystick choice

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Joystick auxillaryStick
      Joystick to use for the auxiliary driver
      edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.buttons.Button centerOnGear
      Button to center on the gear's vision target
      edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.buttons.Button centerOnHighGoal
      Button to center the robot on the vision target
      edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.buttons.Button climb
      Button to climb
      edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.buttons.Button collectBalls
      Button to collect balls
      edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.buttons.Button contourError
      Button to signify that the robot has made an incorrect action based off of a contour
      edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Joystick driverPrimaryStick
      Joystick on the drivers right side (or the XBox controller for driving the robot)
      edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Joystick driverSecondaryStick
      Joystick on the drivers left side (or not used)
      edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.buttons.Button driveToGear
      Button to drive towards the gear's vision target
      edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.buttons.Button driveToHighGoal
      Button to activate driving the robot towards the center of a vision target
      edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.buttons.Button drivetrainRangefinder
      Prints the value of the drive train's rangefinder
      edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.buttons.Button leftDrivetrainEncoder
      Prints the value of the drive train's left encoder and resets its value
      edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.buttons.Button rightDrivetrainEncoder
      Prints the value of the drive train's right encoder and resets its value
      edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.buttons.Button safetyMode
      Button to reduce the speed of the robot by RobotMap.DRIVE_SAFETY_FACTOR
      SaveTrajectoryTrigger saveTrajectoryTrigger
      Trigger to continue driving based on the robot's current trajectory
      edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.buttons.Button shoot
      Button to use the shooter
      edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.buttons.Button straightMode
      Button to make the robot drive straight
